tool_description: We help you to send push notifications for your Expo Tokens.
name: PushAppy
title: PushAppy

api_list.name: send-push
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pushappy.p.rapidapi.com/send-push"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pushappy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pushappy.p.rapidapi.com/send-push"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pushappy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
